application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3b & h (Submission of details) of listed building consent 21/04074 (Variation of Condition 2 (compliance with approved drawings) of Listed Building consent LB/19/95024 to replace single glazing with double glazing; change floor level in winter garden, addition of door handle; increase insulation thickness, fitted furniture in study and around lift shaft; insertion of fire double door to kitchen; floor tiling in upper ground floor hallway; addition of two sets of fire doors to lower ground floor spa and sauna; addition of service trench for ventilation duct on basement level; revised layout to second floor master bathroom with addition of double door to dressing room; shift skylight on second floor to centre of room; alter size and location for dormer window at attic level)
